content.introduction:
I'm a self-taught full-stack and detailed-oriented engineer.
I like to solve problems by coding and keep on writing clean and stable code.
I'm also an <1><2>Adventurer, always curious about new technologies and willing to share.
I'm sensitive to others' emotions, try to establish harmony, and minimize conflict.
content.backendDetails: Two years and one year of experience with <0>NodeJS/Express</0> and <1>Python/FastAPI</1> respectively. Almost use SQL-like databases, utilize indexes frequently to speed up query efficiency, and also used <2>Firebase</2> for chat room development. Apply <3>cheerio</3> to crawl  live scores of games information.
content.frontendDetails: I've experience in ReactJS for half a year. Make good use of <0>Redux Toolkit</0> to centrally manage the state and cooperate with <1>RTK Query</1> to simplify the code for loading API data. And I'm used to using Typescript for JS development. Has the basic ability of HTML/CSS, often used <2>styled-component</2> to develop component.
content.devOpsDetails: More familiar with AWS cloud services, used with <0>EC2</0>, <1>S3</1>, <2>RDS</2>, etc., and set up <3>CodeDeploy</3> to automatically deploy code. Apply <4>GCE</4> to manage virtual machines and scheduling, and cooperate with <5>PM2</5> to manage multiple NodeJS processes. Utilize <6>Docker-Compose</6> to build backend and frontend services.

5.mainTask: Data Engineering and Labeling Technology Applications.
tasks: Familiar with search API with multiple queries based on <1>RESTful</1> designed, like aggregate function, having clause
Implement the concept of microservices by <1>Docker</1> Compose, each project communicates via API gateway
Connect Google OAuth 2.0 API for third-party login and <1>JWT</1> token for native login
Using <1>Alembic</1> toolkit for auto-generating database migrations
Realize the rollback of multiple data creation by <1>Redis</1> and sync primary key when sequence out of sync
